docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: About CENCOSUD We are a multi-format retail presence in 5 countries and more than 140 thousand people, divided into the following business units: Costanera Center Department Stores Supermarkets Home Improvement and Construction Financial Retailing Shopping Centers Currenty Situation Today CENCOSUD has a MPLS VPN network to interconnect countries, this network attend the CENCOSUD requirements related do connectivity but does not work good in terms of connectivity but they are not able to identify other issues like loss, jitter, latency. So if some link has a degradation the MPLS VPN is not able to routing the packet through the best path. CENCOSUD ASK For a solution to help network team to have more flexibility to configure and modify the configs, today they do everything manually and they are looking for a real SDN solution. They are also asking for a solution that where critical enterprise applications always maintain the highest service-level agreements (SLAs) and optimal performance, even if problems occur in the network. Visualize in-depth analytics and historical insights for troubleshooting and root-cause analysis with a single dashboard. Mitigate network issues in real time with automated dynamic path selection, which automatically steers critical applications around network problems
docs.title: About CENCOSUD

docs.text: CENCOSUD International Currently CENCOSUD has an International network that interconnect 5 countries: Argentina Chile Brasil Colombia Peru CENCOSUD Physical Topology The diagram bellow represent the CENCOSUD physical connections between all countries, CENCOSUD Physical Topology The diagram bellow represent the CENCOSUD MPLS VPN Topology that CENCOSUD use to interconnect sites.
